tr_quotes.quote: Toplum sevgiyle kaynaşır, adaletle yaşar
tr_quotes.author: Farabi

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir uyuşturucu, hatta alkol bile, toplumsal hastalıkların ana sebebi değildir. Eğer sorunlarımızın asıl kaynağını arıyorsak, insanlara uyuşturucu testi yapmak yerine; aptallık, cahillik, açgözlülük ve güç hayranlığı testi uygulamalıyız.
tr_quotes.author: Patrick Jake

tr_quotes.quote: Şehit vermekten daha acı bir durum varsa o da şehit vermeye alıştırılmış bir toplum inşaa etmeye çalışmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Muhsin Yazıcıoğlu

tr_quotes.quote: Topluluk içinde yaşayanlar,kendilerini, arkadaşlarına nasıl görünüyorlarsa aynalarda tıpkı öyle görmeyi öğrenmişlerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Jean Paul Sartre

tr_quotes.quote: Toplum; güven üstüne kurulmuştur.
tr_quotes.author: South

tr_quotes.quote: Toplum, herkesin aynı olduğu ve kimsenin hayatta olmadığı varsayımına dayanır.
tr_quotes.author: Hung Kingsmil

tr_quotes.quote: Namus adına kadını cehalete mahkum eden toplumlar cehaletin yetiştirdiği namusuzluklarla boğuşmaya mahkumdurlar.
tr_quotes.author: Ülkü Sincar

tr_quotes.quote: İyi olduğun için toplumun sana adil davranmasını beklemek; vejeteryan olduğun için, boğanın sana saldırmayacağını düşünmeye benzer.
tr_quotes.author: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

tr_quotes.quote: Muazzam bir akıl, insanı toplum ilişkilerinden uzak tutmaya meyillidir.
tr_quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

tr_quotes.quote: Bir toplum inanç ve davranışlarını değiştirmedikçe, Allah da onların durumunu değiştirmez.
tr_quotes.author: Ra'd Suresi, 11. Ayet

tr_quotes.quote: Toplumun toplum olması için, toplumda bir tabakanın düşünmek için zaman ayırması zorunludur.
tr_quotes.author: Aristoteles

tr_quotes.quote: Düşündüğünü söylemekten korkmaya başlarsa bir kişi, düşünmekten de korkmaya başlar.
tr_quotes.author: Vedat Türkali

tr_quotes.quote: Çocukluk öldüğünde geriye kalan cesetlere yetişkin adı verilir ve bunlar cehennemin kibarca söylenişi olan toplum daki yerlerini alırlar.
tr_quotes.author: Brian Aldiss

tr_quotes.quote: Bir kültürün özümsediği batıl inanç miktarı, insanlarının sahip olduğu bilgi miktarı ile ters orantılıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Jacque Fresco

tr_quotes.quote: Biliyor musun Meg? Kötü olanla, bize kötü olduğu öğretilenler farklı şeyler olabilir. Toplum bize bazı şeylerin kötü olduğunu öğretip bizi köleleştirmeye çalışır.
tr_quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçekten ahlaklı bir hayat için kişinin kendisini toplumun ahlaki değerlerinden arındırması gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

tr_quotes.quote: Gelişmiş toplumlar dindar oldukları için değil dine rağmen gelişmiştir.
tr_quotes.author: Mark Twain

tr_quotes.quote: Neden toplum her yaştan insanın değil de sadece çocukların eğitiminden kendini sorumlu tutuyor?
tr_quotes.author: Erich Fromm

tr_quotes.quote: Şunu öğrenmelisin: Sen hiçbir işe yaramaz değilsin. Seni senden çalan toplumdur.
tr_quotes.author: Tezer Özlü

tr_quotes.quote: Bir öğreti ne kadar mantıksız olursa olsun, toplum tarafından kabul edilerek güç kazandığı zaman, milyonlarca insan kendilerini dışlanmış ve izole edilmiş hissetmektense, ona inanmayı tercih edecektir.
tr_quotes.author: Erich Fromm

tr_quotes.quote: Adalet devletin amacıdır. Sivil toplumun amacıdır. Adalet için daima mücadele edilecektir.
tr_quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

tr_quotes.quote: Adalet ilkin devletten gelmelidir. Çünkü hukuk, devletin toplumsal düzenidir.
tr_quotes.author: Aristo

tr_quotes.quote: Ahlaki değerleri ve inançları olmayan bir toplum olamaz.
tr_quotes.author: Robert Montgomery

tr_quotes.quote: Ancak üstün insanların bulunduğu toplumlar, üstündür.
tr_quotes.author: Fonvizin

tr_quotes.quote: Ayrı ayrı birer ahlaksız yaratık olan insanlar, toplu oldukları zaman namuslu kişiler olurlar.
tr_quotes.author: Charles de Montesquieu

tr_quotes.quote: Bir insanı ahlaken eğitmeden sadece zihnen eğitmek topluma bir bela kazandırmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: F. D. Roosevelt

tr_quotes.quote: Bir tek kişiye yapılan bir haksızlık, bütün topluma yapılan bir tehdittir.
tr_quotes.author: Montesquieu

tr_quotes.quote: Bir topluluk, bireyin uzamış gölgesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Emerson

tr_quotes.quote: Bir toplum ne kadar özgür olursa güç kullanmak o kadar zorlaşır.
tr_quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

tr_quotes.quote: Bir toplum, kendi başına yaşamayan insanların bir araya gelmesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Paul Valery

tr_quotes.quote: Bir topluma her şeyden önce ilim ve ahlakı öğretmek gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Epictetus

tr_quotes.quote: Bir toplumda öz-yönetim için gerekli vasıflar doğuştan gelmez. Bunlar alışkanlıkların ve uzun süreli eğitimlerin sonucudur ve bu sebepten zaman ve muhtemelen çokça zahmet gerektirir.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

tr_quotes.quote: Bir toplumda yasalar bir kişinin isteğine göre hazırlanırsa o toplumda insanlık ve adalet bulamazsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

tr_quotes.quote: Bir toplumun içinde; geçmişin kalıntıları, geleceğin filizleri ve güncelin egemenliği birlikte yaşar.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Fielding

tr_quotes.quote: Ancak üstün insanların bulunduğu toplumlar, üstündür.
tr_quotes.author: Fonvizin

tr_quotes.quote: Çoğu insan toplum içinde şaşırmış gibi davrandığı şeylerden çok daha kötüsünü özel hayatlarında görmüştür.
tr_quotes.author: E.W. Howe

tr_quotes.quote: Deliliğini topluma kabul ettirebilene dahi derler ben ettiremedim tımarhanedeyim.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Düşünürlerin aydınlatamadığı toplumu, şarlatanlar aydınlatır.
tr_quotes.author: Condorcet

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitimli insanlar topluma borçludurlar. Bir işin nasıl yapılabileceğini biliyorken bir başkasının yapamadığını görüp susmaları kendilerini yetiştiren o topluma ihanettir.
tr_quotes.author: M. Niyazi Saral

tr_quotes.quote: En iyi toplum, bilinçli üreten ve tüketen toplumdur.
tr_quotes.author: Bruce Burton

tr_quotes.quote: Her toplumun temel derdi, genç erkekleri oyalayacak uğraş bulma sorunudur.
tr_quotes.author: Margaret Mead

tr_quotes.quote: Herkes kendi işini görse, toplumun bütün işleri düzgün gider.
tr_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Hiç kimse, herkes tamamıyla özgür olmadan özgür olamaz, tamamıyla ahlaklı olmadam. ahlaklı olamaz. Hiç kimse, herkes tamamıyla mutlu olmadan mutlu olamaz.
tr_quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

tr_quotes.quote: İfade özgürlüğünü, yasalar tek başına garanti edemez. Herkesin kendi düşüncesini, cezalandırma olmaksızın açıklayabilmesi için toplumda hoşgörü mevcut olmalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: İlme ve alime saygısı olmayan toplumlar, köle olurlar.
tr_quotes.author: Eyyüp Sabri Osmanoğlu

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan doğal olarak iyidir, onu kötü yapan toplumdur.
tr_quotes.author: Miguel de Unamuno

tr_quotes.quote: En iyi toplum, bilinçli üreten ve tüketen toplumdur.
tr_quotes.author: Bruce Burton

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan olmak kolay değildir, hele ki ‘insanca’ yaşanabilecek bir toplum düzeni yoksa!
tr_quotes.author: John Steinbeck

tr_quotes.quote: Toplumun değişmesi için topluluğun değişmesi değil önce bireylerin değişmesi gerek.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnançlarını yitirmiş, ahlaki değerlerini kaybetmiş bir toplum hastalıklı bir toplum olur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge is power. Information is liberating. Education is the premise of progress, in every society, in every family
en_quotes.author: Kofi Annan

en_quotes.quote: The internet could be a very positive step towards education, organisation and participation in a meaningful society
en_quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

en_quotes.quote: Without memory, there is no culture. Without memory, there would be no civilization, no society, no future
en_quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

en_quotes.quote: To educate a man in mind and not in morals is to educate a menace to society
en_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: Good humor is one of the best articles of dress one can wear in society
en_quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

en_quotes.quote: Everyone in society should be a role model, not only for their own self-respect, but for respect from others
en_quotes.author: Barry Bonds

en_quotes.quote: A great man is different from an eminent one in that he is ready to be the servant of the society
en_quotes.author: B. R. Ambedkar

en_quotes.quote: I think the teaching profession contributes more to the future of our society than any other single profession
en_quotes.author: John Wooden

en_quotes.quote: Access to computers and the Internet has become a basic need for education in our society
en_quotes.author: Kent Conrad

en_quotes.quote: We won't have a society if we destroy the environment
en_quotes.author: Margaret Mead

en_quotes.quote: We have to talk about liberating minds as well as liberating society
en_quotes.author: Angela Davis

en_quotes.quote: The forces in a capitalist society, if left unchecked, tend to make the rich richer and the poor poorer
en_quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

en_quotes.quote: If you truly believe in the value of life, you care about all of the weakest and most vulnerable members of society
en_quotes.author: Joni Eareckson Tada

en_quotes.quote: Ethnic diversity adds richness to a society
en_quotes.author: Gary Locke

en_quotes.quote: Any society where it's a crime or a hassle to be different is a society based on psychological fascism
en_quotes.author: David Icke

en_quotes.quote: Patriotism is the secret resource of a successful society
en_quotes.author: Michael Ignatieff

en_quotes.quote: The finest clothing made is a person's own skin, but, of course, society demands something more than this
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: Every human society has its lights and its shadows. That's the reality of existence
en_quotes.author: Sebastian Lelio

en_quotes.quote: Society is unity in diversity
en_quotes.author: George Herbert Mead

en_quotes.quote: Human society sustains itself by transforming nature into garbage
en_quotes.author: Mason Cooley

en_quotes.quote: The scars and stains of racism are still deeply embedded in the American society
en_quotes.author: John Lewis

en_quotes.quote: The Electoral College needs to go, because it's made our society less and less democratic
en_quotes.author: Pete Buttigieg

en_quotes.quote: It is, I believe, the greatest generation any society has ever produced
en_quotes.author: Tom Brokaw

en_quotes.quote: A gender-equal society would be one where the word 'gender' does not exist: where everyone can be themselves
en_quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

en_quotes.quote: Abuse of words has been the great instrument of sophistry and chicanery, of party, faction, and division of society
en_quotes.author: John Adams

en_quotes.quote: Early childhood education is the key to the betterment of society
en_quotes.author: Maria Montessori

en_quotes.quote: Society is always taken by surprise at any new example of common sense
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: If we as a society are willing to have a preference for organic food, the farmer can pass on the savings
en_quotes.author: Robert Patterson

en_quotes.quote: I think our society is all about judgment, which is so rude and disrespectful
en_quotes.author: Raven-Symone

en_quotes.quote: Society is like a stew. If you don't stir it up every once in a while then a layer of scum floats to the top
en_quotes.author: Edward Abbey

en_quotes.quote: Freedom in art, freedom in society, this is the double goal towards which all consistent and logical minds must strive
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: Censorship reflects a society's lack of confidence in itself
en_quotes.author: Potter Stewart

en_quotes.quote: Irrespective of any political party, I am a supporter of good people who want to do something for the society
en_quotes.author: Kapil Dev

en_quotes.quote: Society bristles with enigmas which look hard to solve. It is a perfect maze of intrigue
en_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

en_quotes.quote: A state of society where men may not speak their minds cannot long endure
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: Drones overall will be more impactful than I think people recognize, in positive ways to help society
en_quotes.author: Bill Gates

en_quotes.quote: Society cares for the individual only so far as he is profitable
en_quotes.author: Simone de Beauvoir

en_quotes.quote: The danger of the past was that men became slaves. The danger of the future is that men may become robots
en_quotes.author: Erich Fromm

en_quotes.quote: The family is the first essential cell of human society
en_quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

en_quotes.quote: No society can surely be flourishing and happy, of which the far greater part of the members are poor and miserable
en_quotes.author: Adam Smith

en_quotes.quote: It is no measure of health to be well adjusted to a profoundly sick society
en_quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

en_quotes.quote: We are trying to construct a more inclusive society. We are going to make a country in which no one is left out
en_quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: I think being different, going against the grain of society is the greatest thing in the world
en_quotes.author: Elijah Wood

en_quotes.quote: In just about every area of society, there's nothing more important than ethics
en_quotes.author: Henry Paulson

en_quotes.quote: In much of society, research means to investigate something you do not know or understand
en_quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

en_quotes.quote: Princes and governments are far more dangerous than other elements within society
en_quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

en_quotes.quote: My purpose in life does not include a hankering to charm society
en_quotes.author: James Dean

en_quotes.quote: To understand how any society functions you must understand the relationship between the men and the women
en_quotes.author: Angela Davis

en_quotes.quote: Communication is at the very core of our society. That's what makes us human
en_quotes.author: Jan Koum

en_quotes.quote: For too long in this society, we have celebrated unrestrained individualism over common community
en_quotes.author: Joe Biden

en_quotes.quote: When people accept breaking the law as normal, something happens to the whole society
en_quotes.author: Orson Welles

en_quotes.quote: The happiness of society is the end of government
en_quotes.author: John Adams

en_quotes.quote: No one can live entirely on their own, nor can any country or society exist in isolation
en_quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

en_quotes.quote: The ultimate test of a moral society is the kind of world that it leaves to its children
en_quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

en_quotes.quote: We seek to create a united Democratic and non-racial society
en_quotes.author: Oliver Tambo

en_quotes.quote: Education is simply the soul of a society as it passes from one generation to another
en_quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

en_quotes.quote: Clearly, the decision-making that we rely on in society is fallible. It's highly fallible, and we should know that
en_quotes.author: Daniel Kahneman

en_quotes.quote: I chose America as my home because I value freedom and democracy, civil liberties and an open society
en_quotes.author: George Soros

en_quotes.quote: In reality, victims of human trafficking are often left voiceless and completely unseen by society
en_quotes.author: Elise Stefanik

en_quotes.quote: I think the first duty of society is justice
en_quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

en_quotes.quote: All that is valuable in human society depends upon the opportunity for development accorded the individual
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: Society exists only as a mental concept; in the real world there are only individuals
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: In my afternoon walk I would fain forget all my morning occupations and my obligations to society
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: Caste has divided us. I wish it should be completely abolished from our society
en_quotes.author: Vijay Sethupathi

en_quotes.quote: One of the greatest casualties of the war in Vietnam is the Great Society... shot down on the battlefield of Vietnam
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: As a society, we can't hide from the future; we have to build and own it
en_quotes.author: Andrew Yang

en_quotes.quote: If one could only teach the English how to talk, and the Irish how to listen, society here would be quite civilized
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: Society is like a large piece of frozen water; and skating well is the great art of social life
en_quotes.author: Letitia Elizabeth Landon

en_quotes.quote: Be able to be alone. Lose not the advantage of solitude, and the society of thyself
en_quotes.author: Thomas Browne

en_quotes.quote: The trouble with the rat race is that even if you win, you're still a rat
en_quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

en_quotes.quote: Creativity is a game changer. That's true of society, in advertising and in life
en_quotes.author: David Droga

en_quotes.quote: The most dangerous creation of any society is the man who has nothing to lose
en_quotes.author: James Baldwin

en_quotes.quote: There are a number of women who have brought about immense change in society
en_quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

en_quotes.quote: The health of a democratic society may be measured by the quality of functions performed by private citizens
en_quotes.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

en_quotes.quote: One can be instructed in society, one is inspired only in solitude
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: I started thinking about joy. Everything in our society is so purposeful. Let's bring joy back to the experience
en_quotes.author: Sara Blakely

en_quotes.quote: The progress of society is mainly the improvement in the condition of the workingmen of the world
en_quotes.author: Rutherford B. Hayes

en_quotes.quote: Automation is great for profits, but it's a real potential trouble area for society
en_quotes.author: Chieh Huang

en_quotes.quote: In our society, the women who break down barriers are those who ignore limits
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: Society therefore is as ancient as the world
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: The most violent element in society is ignorance
en_quotes.author: Emma Goldman

en_quotes.quote: No system of mass surveillance has existed in any society that we know of to this point that has not been abused
en_quotes.author: Edward Snowden

en_quotes.quote: Individual rights are the means of subordinating society to moral law
en_quotes.author: Ayn Rand

en_quotes.quote: Nobility is a graceful ornament to the civil order. It is the Corinthian capital of polished society
en_quotes.author: Edmund Burke

en_quotes.quote: Manners are the basic building blocks of civil society
en_quotes.author: Alexander McCall Smith

en_quotes.quote: The reconnection of society, economy and ethics is a project we cannot postpone
en_quotes.author: Michael D. Higgins

en_quotes.quote: To be okay with not knowing is a sign of a mature person and a mature society
en_quotes.author: Hisham Matar

en_quotes.quote: Once the fabric of a just society is undone, it takes generations to weave it back together
en_quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

en_quotes.quote: Once something is memorable, it's living and you're using it. That to me is the foundation of a creative society
en_quotes.author: Yo-Yo Ma

en_quotes.quote: The roof cannot collapse when the value pillars of government and society are sound and strong
en_quotes.author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo

en_quotes.quote: There is no higher value in our society than integrity
en_quotes.author: Arlen Specter

en_quotes.quote: We are a segmented society, living in our individual bubbles
en_quotes.author: Richard Cohen

en_quotes.quote: A lion is not a lion is not a lion. As individuals, as mates, as members of a society, they're all very different
en_quotes.author: Frans Lanting

en_quotes.quote: The reason why men enter into society is the preservation of their property
en_quotes.author: John Locke

en_quotes.quote: Society is the union of men and not the men themselves
en_quotes.author: Montesquieu

en_quotes.quote: You can't make up anything anymore. The world itself is a satire. All you're doing is recording it
en_quotes.author: Art Buchwald

en_quotes.quote: You seek help from the elders. A society with elders is healthy. It's not always that way in the West
en_quotes.author: Bernard Lagat

en_quotes.quote: Society has always to demand a little more from human beings than it will get in practice
en_quotes.author: George Orwell

en_quotes.quote: Any society based on domination supports and condones violence
en_quotes.author: bell hooks

en_quotes.quote: I think it's important to hold a mirror up to society and yourself
en_quotes.author: Ricky Gervais

en_quotes.quote: Art, freedom and creativity will change society faster than politics
en_quotes.author: Victor Pinchuk

en_quotes.quote: The decisions we make about communication security today will determine the kind of society we live in tomorrow
en_quotes.author: Whitfield Diffie

en_quotes.quote: My personal position is that society must keep children safe
en_quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

en_quotes.quote: If you let society and your peers define who you are, you're the less for it
en_quotes.author: Hugh Hefner

en_quotes.quote: No good is ever done to society by the pictorial representation of its diseases
en_quotes.author: John Ruskin

en_quotes.quote: Exclusiveness in a garden is a mistake as great as it is in society
en_quotes.author: Alfred Austin

en_quotes.quote: Improved maternal health benefits the whole of society
en_quotes.author: Isabella Lovin

en_quotes.quote: Cockroaches and socialites are the only things that can stay up all night and eat anything
en_quotes.author: Herb Caen

en_quotes.quote: Rule of law is the most important element in any civil society
en_quotes.author: Mo Ibrahim

en_quotes.quote: A people that values its privileges above its principles soon loses both
en_quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

en_quotes.quote: Our individual lives cannot, generally, be works of art unless the social order is also
en_quotes.author: Charles Horton Cooley

en_quotes.quote: There can be no keener revelation of a society's soul than the way in which it treats its children
en_quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

en_quotes.quote: I had three chairs in my house; one for solitude, two for friendship, three for society
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: I believe discrimination still exists in society and we must fight it in every form
en_quotes.author: Andrew Cuomo

en_quotes.quote: Men and women must be educated, in a great degree, by the opinions and manners of the society they live in
en_quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft

en_quotes.quote: I lead Labor - Labor is the party that founded the state of Israel; it's deeply rooted in Israeli society
en_quotes.author: Isaac Herzog

en_quotes.quote: The value of a dollar is social, as it is created by society
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: In every society some men are born to rule, and some to advise
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Society can overlook murder, adultery or swindling; it never forgives preaching of a new gospel
en_quotes.author: Edmund Burke

en_quotes.quote: Arguments are extremely vulgar, for everyone in good society holds exactly the same opinion
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: A civilized society is one which tolerates eccentricity to the point of doubtful sanity
en_quotes.author: Robert Frost

en_quotes.quote: I suppose society is wonderfully delightful. To be in it is merely a bore. But to be out of it is simply a tragedy
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: As a remedy to life in society I would suggest the big city. Nowadays, it is the only desert within our means
en_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: I should tie myself to no particular system of society other than of socialism
en_quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

en_quotes.quote: An armed society is a polite society. Manners are good when one may have to back up his acts with his life
en_quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

en_quotes.quote: Until we get equality in education, we won't have an equal society
en_quotes.author: Sonia Sotomayor

en_quotes.quote: Our society strives to avoid any possibility of offending anyone - except God
en_quotes.author: Billy Graham

en_quotes.quote: Being homeless is like living in a post-apocalyptic world. You're on the outskirts of society
en_quotes.author: Frank Dillane

en_quotes.quote: Most of the change we think we see in life is due to truths being in and out of favor
en_quotes.author: Robert Frost

en_quotes.quote: A society should never become like a pond with stagnant water, without movement. That's the most important thing
en_quotes.author: Mikhail Gorbachev

en_quotes.quote: The Internet: transforming society and shaping the future through chat
en_quotes.author: Dave Barry

en_quotes.quote: As society changes, as politics change, as people change, certain songs still seem to resonate
en_quotes.author: Beck

en_quotes.quote: Racism is beyond common sense and has no place in our society
en_quotes.author: Morrissey

en_quotes.quote: Mass media provides the essential link between the individual and the demands of the technological society
en_quotes.author: Jacques Ellul

en_quotes.quote: The entertainment industry is vast and is a reflection of the society we live in
en_quotes.author: Karrine Steffans

en_quotes.quote: I think we risk becoming the best informed society that has ever died of ignorance
en_quotes.author: Ruben Blades

en_quotes.quote: Being a model and an actress, I feel we a have a responsibility towards society
en_quotes.author: Urvashi Rautela

en_quotes.quote: A liberal education is at the heart of a civil society, and at the heart of a liberal education is the act of teaching
en_quotes.author: A. Bartlett Giamatti

en_quotes.quote: Civilized society is perpetually menaced with disintegration through this primary hostility of men towards one another
en_quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

en_quotes.quote: If society fits you comfortably enough, you call it freedom
en_quotes.author: Robert Frost

en_quotes.quote: The exercise of natural rights has no limits but such as will ensure their enjoyment to other members of society
en_quotes.author: Marquis de Lafayette

en_quotes.quote: Our society is used to judging content by its package and label
en_quotes.author: Joanna Krupa

en_quotes.quote: Money is the barometer of a society's virtue
en_quotes.author: Ayn Rand

en_quotes.quote: One of the definitions of sanity is the ability to tell real from unreal. Soon we'll need a new definition
en_quotes.author: Alvin Toffler

en_quotes.quote: You can find your way across this country using burger joints the way a navigator uses stars
en_quotes.author: Charles Kuralt

en_quotes.quote: An active and vibrant railway system confers many benefits on the society
en_quotes.author: Yemi Osinbajo

en_quotes.quote: Elegance for one society is not elegance for another. It's in the eyes of the beholder
en_quotes.author: Louise Wilson

en_quotes.quote: There is nothing more fearful for the average person in our society than to stand before a group of people and speak
en_quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

en_quotes.quote: Women are the real architects of society
en_quotes.author: Cher

en_quotes.quote: The fundamental defect of fathers, in our competitive society, is that they want their children to be a credit to them
en_quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

en_quotes.quote: Affirmative action is an effort to include every aspect of society in the decision making
en_quotes.author: Andrew Young

en_quotes.quote: What we do as a society is seek simple answers
en_quotes.author: Dean Koontz

en_quotes.quote: Nature makes only dumb animals. We owe the fools to society
en_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

en_quotes.quote: If society will not admit of woman's free development, then society must be remodeled
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Blackwell

en_quotes.quote: Neither the life of an individual nor the history of a society can be understood without understanding both
en_quotes.author: C. Wright Mills

en_quotes.quote: The human mind is a dramatic structure in itself and our society is absolutely saturated with drama
en_quotes.author: Edward Bond

en_quotes.quote: Write about society as news and treat it like sociology
en_quotes.author: Clifton Daniel

en_quotes.quote: I believe we can continue the Great Society while we fight in Vietnam
en_quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

en_quotes.quote: I'm trying to make God more relevant in our society
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: The society based on production is only productive, not creative
en_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: In these times you have to be an optimist to open your eyes when you awake in the morning
en_quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

en_quotes.quote: Education, housing and hospitals are the most important things for society
en_quotes.author: Zaha Hadid

en_quotes.quote: A society made up of individuals who were all capable of original thought would probably be unendurable
en_quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

en_quotes.quote: For a long time, society put obstacles in the way of women who wanted to enter the sciences
en_quotes.author: Sally Ride

en_quotes.quote: I feel like sometimes that I was not meant for this society
en_quotes.author: Mike Tyson

en_quotes.quote: I don't think even ungodly people realize what a society would be like that had no godly influence at all
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: Unbroken' was published as a help to society
en_quotes.author: Louis Zamperini

en_quotes.quote: Free speech has been used by the Supreme Court to give immense power to the wealthiest members of our society
en_quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

en_quotes.quote: We live in an image society. Speeches are not what anybody cares about; what they care about is the picture
en_quotes.author: Madeleine Albright

en_quotes.quote: Revolution is born as a social entity within the oppressor society
en_quotes.author: Paulo Freire

en_quotes.quote: I cannot believe there is caste system in society; I cannot believe people are judged on the basis of their prosperity
en_quotes.author: Saina Nehwal

en_quotes.quote: Men of genius are often dull and inert in society; as the blazing meteor, when it descends to earth, is only a stone
en_quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

en_quotes.quote: Our society needs to become less fragmented and more open to alternative viewpoints
en_quotes.author: Susan Collins

en_quotes.quote: The American automobile has changed the habits of every member of modern society
en_quotes.author: Raymond Loewy

en_quotes.quote: If the nation is rich but people are poor, the country cannot be strong, and society will be unstable
en_quotes.author: Zong Qinghou

en_quotes.quote: Part of your heritage in this society is the opportunity to become financially independent
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: No one would talk much in society if they knew how often they misunderstood others
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: I have observed that society in general always seems to honor its living conformists and its dead troublemakers
en_quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

en_quotes.quote: Our modern society - especially in the West, and especially now - reveres youth
en_quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

en_quotes.quote: Every society honors its live conformists and its dead troublemakers
en_quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

en_quotes.quote: Nothing is good in this society. This patriarchal society is bad
en_quotes.author: Qandeel Baloch

en_quotes.quote: In any society, fanatics who hate don't hate only me - they hate you, too. They hate everybody
en_quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

en_quotes.quote: There is no such thing as society: there are individual men and women, and there are families
en_quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

en_quotes.quote: We have an epidemic of insecure people in our society today
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: The hallmark of a healthy society has always been measured by how it cares for the disadvantaged
en_quotes.author: Joni Eareckson Tada

en_quotes.quote: Courts of law, and all the paraphernalia and folly of law cannot be found in a rational state of society
en_quotes.author: Robert Owen

en_quotes.quote: Has there ever been a society which has died of dissent? Several have died of conformity in our lifetime
en_quotes.author: Jacob Bronowski

en_quotes.quote: If the children of a group's founder are to take over that group, they need the endorsement of society
en_quotes.author: Lee Kun-hee
